Home » 17A9 Navakanipātapāḷi » 2 Dutiyapaṇṇāsaka » 2.2 Satipaṭṭhānavagga
2.2.8 Uddhambhāgiyasutta
Dutiyapaṇṇāsaka
Satipaṭṭhānavagga
Uddhambhāgiyasutta
70.
457“Pañcimāni, bhikkhave, uddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni. Katamāni pañca? Rūparāgo, arūparāgo, māno, uddhaccaṃ, avijjā—  imāni kho, bhikkhave, pañcuddhambhāgiyāni saṃyojanāni.
458Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ uddhambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānāya…pe…  ime cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvetabbā”ti.
459Aṭṭhamaṃ.
